summary: The client asked Sarah to start a vision meeting. The PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide comments, and no decisions were made.

actions.task: Start a vision meeting as requested by the client

risks.risk: No name chosen for the project and key roles (Architect, Developer, QA) provided no input, risking delayed alignment and planning.
risks.mitigation: PM to follow up to propose project name options and solicit input from Architect, Developer, and QA before the meeting; schedule a short prep session if needed.
